1466790.name: Damien - Forest
1466790.description:
Damien is a first-person Slenderman like game.
What happened here and why did people move out in such a hurry?
A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story!

A first-person horror adventure game. Players explore the forest, uncover its unknown secrets, and face threats along the way.
Collect pages and try to survive when Damien follows you in the big forest map.
You're on your own. No one to come for you. No one to help you. No one to hear you scream. Damien - Forest is the videogame adaption of Slender Man.

Experience the horror all over again.



FEATURE

EXPLORE
Explore this creepy town, experience the terrifying journey, and discover the secrets within.

SURVIVAL
A terrifying spirit is roaming in this place, one mistake could lead you to hell. So, be careful, you’ll need more than a little luck.

PUZZLE
However, the horror spirit is not the only threat you’ll face. Find clues, try to unlock secret doors and rooms, and piece together the truth.

GAMEPLAY
A new unique way to play Damien.
1466790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
